Verses: 1 idhinaal En Irudhayam Thaththaliththu, Thannidaththaivittuth Therikkiradhu.
2 avarudaiya Saththaththinaal Undaagira Adhirchchiyaiyum, Avar Vaayilirundhu Purappadugira Muzhakkaththaiyum Gavanamaaik Kelungal.
3 avar Vaanaththin Keezhengum Andhath Thoniyaiyum, Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalmel Adhin Minnalaiyum Sellavidugiraar.
4 adharkuppinbu Avar Saththamaai Muzhangi, Thammudaiya Magaththuvaththin Saththaththaik Kumurappannugiraar; Avarudaiya Saththam Ketkappadumpodhu Adhaith Thavirkkamudiyaadhu.
5 dhevan Thammudaiya Saththaththai Aachchariyamaanavidhamaaik Kumurappannugiraar; Naam Gragikkak Koodaadha Periyakaariyangalai Avar Seygiraar.
6 avar Uraindha Mazhaiyaiyum, Kalmazhaiyaiyum, Thammudaiya Vallamaiyin Perumazhaiyaiyum Paarththu: Boomiyinmel Peyyungal Endru Kattalaiyidugiraar.
7 thaam Undaakkina Sagala Manusharum Thammai Ariyumpadikku, Avar Sagala Manusharudaiya Kaiyaiyum Muththiriththuppodugiraar.
8 appozhudhu Kaattumirugangal Thangal Kugaigalil Pugundhu, Thangal Kebigalil Thangum.
9 therkeyirundhu Sooraavaliyum, Vadakaatrinaal Kulirum Varum.
10 thammudaiya Suvaasaththinaal Dhevan Kuliraik Kodukkiraar; Appozhudhu Jalaththin Merparappaanadhu Uraindhupom.
11 avar Neerththuligalai Megaththil Etri, Minnalinaal Megaththai Sidharappannugiraar.
12 avar Avaigalukkuk Kattalaiyidugira Yaavaiyum, Avaigal Poochchakkaraththil Nadappikkumpadi, Avar Avaigalaith Thammudaiya Gnaana Aalosanaigalinpadiye Sutrith Thiriyappannugiraar.
13 ondril Thandanaiyaagavum, Ondril Thammudaiya Boomikku Ubayogamaagavum, Ondril Kirubaiyaagavum, Avaigalai Varappannugiraar.
14 yobe, Idharku Sevikodum; Thariththunindru Dhevanudaiya Aachchariyamaana Kiriyaigalaith Dhyaaniththuppaarum.
15 dhevan Avaigalaith Thittampanni, Thammudaiya Megaththin Minnalaip Pragaasikkappannum Vidhaththai Ariveero?
16 megangal Thongumpadi Vaikkum Niraiyaiyum, Poorana Gnaanamullavarin Arpudhamaana Seygaigalaiyum,
17 thendralinaal Avar Boomiyai Amaiyappannumpodhu, Ummudaiya Vasthirangal Ushnamaayirukkum Vagaiyaiyum Ariveero?
18 vaarkkappatta Kannaadiyaippol Kettiyaana Aagaayamandalangalai Neer Avarodekooda Irundhu Viriththeero?
19 avarukku Naam Sollaththakkadhai Engalukkup Podhiyum; Andhagaaraththinimiththam Muraithappip Pesugirom.
20 naan Pesaththunindhen Endru Yaadhaamoruvan Avarukku Munbaaga Sollaththagumo? Oruvan Pesaththunindhaal Avan Vizhungappattuppovaane.
21 ippodhum Kaatru Veesi Aagaayamandalangalilulla Mappu Neengappanniyirukkira Samayaththil Vadakkeyirundhu Ponmayamaana Kaandhi Varugirapodhu,
22 aagaayamandalaththile Pragaasikkira Sooriyanai Mudhalaai Oruvarum Nokkip Paarkkakkoodaadhe; Dhevanidaththilo Bayangaramaana Magaththuvamundu.
23 sarvavallavarai Naam Kandupidikkak Koodaadhu; Avar Vallamaiyilum Nyaayaththilum Peruththavar; Avar Magaaneedhiparar; Avar Odukkamaattaar.
24 aagaiyaal Manushar Avarukku Bayappadavendum; Thangal Ennaththil Gnaanigalaayirukkira Evargalaiyum Madhikkamaattaar Endraan.
